abstract.text: Converts a BIP32 extended private key into its corresponding extended public key, also known as a neutered key.

Create a mnemonic seed (BIP39) from entropy.

= Option(name: .shortAndLong, help: "The signature version of the address."),

abstract.text: Generates a new secret key suitable for ECDSA signing.

abstract.text: Creates an address from the provided public key.
Create a mnemonic seed (BIP39) from entropy.
Computes the public key corresponding to the provided secret key.
